# Where can I purchase Cozmo cubes and other spare parts? {#where-can-i-purchase-cozmo-cubes-and-other-spare-parts .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

Learn below where to get cubes, treads and batteries.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
[Consumable]{style="font-weight: 400;"}** **parts** will be available
for purchase**[ either on DDL.com or via a
retailer.]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Cozmo\'s battery and lift

**Cozmo parts including batteries and lift are not user serviceable and
therefore not available.**[ Please contact DDL Customer Care for
troubleshooting or to review repair options.]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## [Cozmo\'s Cube batteries]{style="font-weight: 400;"}

[**Cozmo\'s Cube batteries are user serviceable.** Cube batteries are
not covered by DDL\'s limited warranty. If a battery dies, please
purchase spares at a retail store. See **[this
FAQ](//support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/222-cozmos-cubes)** for
further information on battery type and how to replace
them.]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## [Cozmo\'s Cubes & Treads]{style="font-weight: 400;"}

**Cubes:** You can purchase Cozmo Cubes on the Digital Dream Labs
website at:
<https://www.digitaldreamlabs.com/products/cozmo-replacement-cubes>\
**Treads:** If you need more treads, you can purchase them here:
<https://www.digitaldreamlabs.com/products/cozmo-replacement-treads>
:::
